body_html:
@lianglia-apollo i rebuilt from sources again today using the latest source codes with the same steps written in my article. the build was successful. so, if someone builds on Ubuntu 16.04 with the steps outlined in the article, there should be no problem.

the error you saw in the build might be related with external dependency (probably Qt5) and not the Caffe2 sources.

body:
@lianglia-apollo i rebuilt from sources again today using the latest source codes with the same steps written in my article. the build was successful. so, if someone builds on Ubuntu 16.04 with the steps outlined in the article, there should be no problem.

the error you saw in the build might be related with external dependency (probably Qt5) and not the Caffe2 sources.
